Message.Msg: Yep, and he did all that while pounding his face against Martin's fist while simultaneously slamming the back of his head against the ground until almost unconscious . . . a great multi-taking effort par excellence. And to add to the amazement he did it ALL without striking back until the LAST second. Very clever of him using his Jedi Mind Tricks to "force" Martin to attack him.
Once Zim left his car he became the "proximate cause" of Martin's death. To what degree is the jury's decision. By virtue of Zim's weapon, he becomes the only side of the story that will be heard.

When Martin attacked him he became the IMMEDIATE cause of his own death. You see, for MOST people assault is considered a felony. A violent felony at that. Sure, not a death penalty offense, but what if it wasn't just an assault but attempted murder? Either way that was the first actual CRIME committed, and therefore was the cause of the shooting. No matter what comes out of someone's mouth, assuming something did, it's not reason to punch someone out.
If Zimmerman was unarmed, he would at this moment be sitting in a nursing home pooping in his Depends.

Message.Title: I see 2 scenarios here
Message.Msg: Survive and thrive or get taken out by a bigger player at around 6B. Regardless the charts are pointing to higher prices.
Blacks seem to feel entitled to punch on whites...just because they are white. The media is on their side, the government is on their side, and half the white race is on their side....so why not?
